## Analysis of the warehousing differential prices between urban and suburban areas

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;">The Logistics City Chair is dedicated to research on urban logistics, with a focus on three scientific axes:</font></font></em></strong></span>

</h4>

<h4 style="text-align: left">

[<strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;" class="">THEME 1.</font></font></strong> ]{style="color: #4ed98d"}<strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;" class=""> Urban logistics real estate</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;" class=""> , new economic models of metropolitan logistics real estate, strategies for implementing logistics buildings in large metropolises.</font></font>

</h4>

<p style="text-align: justify">

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">You can find all the documents relating to the </font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Chair's warehouse database</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> and </font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">cartographic </font></strong></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">production</font></font></strong> <font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> on a dedicated page accessible in the following tab </font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">"Warehouse database"</font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> .</font></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"></font>

</p>

<p style="text-align: left">

<font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">GOALS :</font></font>

</p>

<ul style="text-align: justify">

<li style="text-align: left">

<strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Logistics sprawl and urban logistics</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> : analysis of territorial dynamics linked to the evolution of the location of logistics activities, at the “macro” level.</font></font>

</li>

<li>

<strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Database on warehouse location logic in 78 world cities</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> , following a comparative meta-analysis. </font></font>

<ul style="text-align: justify">

<li><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">The summary presentation of the updated research (October 2023) can be discovered via this </font></font><strong><a href="https://www.lvmt.fr/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/Dablanc-Schorung-De-Oliveira-Palacios-Arguello-De-Oliveira-Presentation-synthetique-update-2024.pdf"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">link</font></font></a></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> .</font></font></li>

<li><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">The research report (September 2023) co-written by Renata de Oliveira and Matthieu Schorung, under the supervision of Laetitia Dablanc is available via this </font></font><a href="https://www.lvmt.fr/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/De-Oliveira-et-al-final-report-9-Oct-2023-final-version-1.pdf"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">link</font></font></strong></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> .</font></font></li>

<li><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">The entire Chair database can be consulted via this </font></font><a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/175FNjg94NO3Tv386Dg77C0xEwAovmOMj/edit?usp=drive_link&amp;ouid=107636382782267213283&amp;rtpof=true&amp;sd=true"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">link</font></font></strong></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> . The dataset on logistics sprawl can be consulted </font></font><a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/17fePE7aBjJ7s6LE86IxA4jUhYtELmiTQ/edit?usp=drive_link&amp;ouid=107636382782267213283&amp;rtpof=true&amp;sd=true"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">here</font></font></strong></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> .</font></font></li>

<li><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">You can find the </font></font><a href="https://halshs.archives-ouvertes.fr/halshs-03369462" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">research report</font></font></strong></a><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> (2022) on logistics sprawl and the price differential for warehouse rental between urban and peri-urban areas based on a comparison of several dozen global metropolises, co-written by Renata de Oliveira, Matthieu Schorung and Laetitia Dablanc.</font></font></li>

<li><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">The initial presentation at the launch of this research, by Laetitia Dablanc, Laura Palacios-Argüello and Leise de Oliveira (2020), on the logic of warehouse location is still available via this </font></font><strong><a href="https://www.lvmt.fr/wp-content/uploads/2022/01/Dablanc-Palacios-Arguello-De-Oliveira-2020.pdf"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">link</font></font></a></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> .</font></font></li>

</ul>

</li>

<li style="text-align: left">

<strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;">Logistics urban planning</font></font></strong><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"><font style="vertical-align: inherit;"> : analysis of public policies, the history of the production of the first buildings, the economic paradox of urban logistics and regulatory obstacles, at the “micro” level.</font></font>

</li>

</ul>
